Oxford.title: Oxford
Oxford.byline: Oxford is the oldest university city in the United Kingdom, some 50 miles (80 km) to the west of the capital London in its own county of Oxfordshire, on the rivers Thames and Cherwell.

Oxford (Mississippi).title: Oxford (Mississippi)
Oxford (Mississippi).byline: Oxford is a historic, picturesque town in North Central Mississippi.

Oxford (Ohio).title: Oxford (Ohio)
Oxford (Ohio).byline: Oxford is a small town in Butler County in Southwest Ohio.

Oxfordshire.title: Oxfordshire
Oxfordshire.byline: Oxfordshire is a county in South East England, on the southern fringes of the West Midlands, bordered by Northamptonshire, Buckinghamshire, Berkshire, Wiltshire, Gloucestershire and Warwickshire.
